name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Happy dog - virtual pet for you and friends

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take care of a virtual pet together with your friends or as an office pet with your team

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A virtual pet living in your browser. Keeping you company while you work, study, or browse the web. Take care of it, feed it, play with it together with your friends.

------------------------
Key Features
------------------------
- Adopt and take care of a happy dog
- You can talk to your happy dog. Share how you feel and let them cheer you up!
- Invite your friends to take care of your dog together
- Take the dog out to walk on any websites, keeping you company while you work, study or browse the web
- Earn stars by taking care happy dogs, and use stars to buy goodies for your dog to wear
- Mood journal: Keep track of your mood with happy dog
- Dogmoji and Photobook:  Take photo with your dog wearing cool goodies, and share with others on the community photobook
- Leaderboard: See which dogs are the most well taken care of
- Join a discord group to chat with happy dog members and ask questions

Note: your happy dog won't show on "new tab" or Chrome Web Store.

------------------------
FAQ
------------------------
* Not all websites welcome your pet, try a different site if your pet doesn't show up
* Your pet gets 1 "star" every time you interact with it. You can then get new goodies with "stars"
* "Mood" increases when you walk, give toys, treat, feed, or pet it
* "Mood" decreases gradually if you don't interact with it for too long
* "Stomach" increases when you feed it or give treats
* "Stomach" decreases gradually if you don't feed it for too long
* "Poop" increases gradually over time
* "Poop" becomes 0 every time you let it poop
* "Energy" decreases every time you play with it, walk it, or pet it
* "Energy" increases gradually when your pet sleeps (shhh! Don't wake it up)
* "Health" increases if your pet is well fed, well rested, and has good mood
* "Health" decreases if your pet is hungry, tired, and has bad mood for too long
